  • Method Details

    • send

      CompletableFuture<JsonrpcResponseSuccess> send(UUID websocketId, JsonrpcRequest request) throws OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException
      Send a JSON-RPC Request to a UI session via WebSocket and expect a JSON-RPC Response.
      Parameters:
      websocketId - the id of the UI websocket connection
      request - the JsonrpcRequest
      Returns:
      the JSON-RPC Success Response Future
      Throws:
      OpenemsError.OpenemsNamedException - on error

      notification - the JsonrpcNotification
